1.0.0.name: wordpress/post-it-widget
1.0.0.description:
a simple wordpress plugin which will create widget in sidebar to post from frontend(without going into admin page) . So you can use it by just activating it. Add [post-widget] shortcode on the page or post where you want to use it

now users can change default text for the widget from there admin options like "post title" , "post description" etc .

visit http://phppoet.com/post-it-widget-wordpress-plugin/ for support and feature request . Looking for guest post plugin ? check our wordpress guest posting plugin
